name: Erotic Poker Mania – Hot Card Game with Strip Poker Rules
name_original: Erotic Poker Mania – Hot Card Game with Strip Poker Rules
description:
Add some entertainment into your life and let random chance choose your fate with the hottest poker ever!

Play just like you were in Vegas. Get straight to the thrill with the best James Bond style poker game for your iPhone or iPad!

To make it even more exciting we have added Strip Poker Rules, so when you lose, you lose a a piece of clothing!

This is a great party game for couples and friends, and a chance to get to know each other just a little better!

Go on give it a go - you know you want to!
